review: The first one I purchased had a faulty HDMI extender. It would only work when directly plugged into the TV's USB port. We finally got the replacement and no issues with this one at all. I pre-ordered mine so I'm not sure if there was some QC issues in earlier batches but if you have a problem, don't give up on this thing because it will work! My stepdad is technologically illiterate and was able to install his on their old VIZIO tv and they have been using it non-stop since they got theirs in mid-January.I like that this does the same thing as my Roku but is much smaller!

review: I have to say I'm very impressed with this little Fire TV Stick.  I like the interface and its up and working on my wireless network in a matter of minutes.
